data.name: Hell Loop
data.detailed_description:
The Villain Protagonist Bundle

Do you enjoy being the bad guy? You can spill even more blood now with our Villain Protagonist Bundle!


Check out more games!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1673940/BITGUN/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1561430/Urban_Mage/


About the Game


Hell Loop is a platformer tower defense game, unlike any other tower defense game you know. You are not defending anything valuable. You are torturing sinners who are continually marching, one by one in a long streak, trying to evade their punishment.








Select from a random subset of available traps - get each game a different choice!


Place traps carefully across the level - you can do it in pause mode or in real-time


Watch the bloodshed and upgrade traps


Manage your resources of blood - upgrades and placing traps cost blood, kills earns blood


Take into account the passive modifiers for the game - they can be both positive and negative!



  • Tower defense meets platformer - a unique combo with a pinch of good old Lemmings vibe (only the Lemmings were cute, our humans are not).
  • Hand-crafted levels with unique challenges. After all who says that hell is only fire and lava. A sinner can very well be tortured in acid or put to work in mines!
  • Select wisely when given the option, as new traps will not come every level.
  • Be aware of game-changing modifiers.
  • Calculate with your blood, every drop of it is important. Killing human grants you a few extra drops.
  • Don't forget to upgrade your traps! No one said being the hell manager is easy."
  • Steam achievements & leaderboard!

data.short_description: "Help! Sinners are escaping from hell! Quickly, kill them all! Click on them, place spikes on the ground, let them walk through fire, shoot them with huge arrows!" Hell Loop is like Lemmings, but you are the hell manager and your goal is to kill them all.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
